Improvements.Description: There is an unnecessary null check on 'session' after it has been assigned to 'transferInSession', which has already been checked for null previously. This check should be removed to clean up the code.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code for setting the identifier and type of 'transferInSession' and firing the 'SessionEndMarkerEvent' is repeated twice. This code can be extracted into a separate method to adhere to the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle.
